moduleMetadataJson.name: General Electric D20ME TFTP Server Buffer Overflow DoS
moduleMetadataJson.description:
By sending a malformed TFTP request to the GE D20ME, it is possible to crash the
        device.

        This module is based on the original 'd20ftpbo.rb' Basecamp module from
        DigitalBond.
author: K. Reid Wightman <wightman@digitalbond.com>
todb <todb@metasploit.com>

options.name: WORKSPACE
options.description: Specify the workspace for this module

options.name: RHOSTS
options.description: The target host(s), range CIDR identifier, or hosts file with syntax 'file:<path>'

options.name: LHOST
options.description: The local IP address to bind to

options.name: RECV_TIMEOUT
options.description: Time (in seconds) to wait between packets
